definitions: An exclamation used to warn of impending trouble or chaos.
A phrase indicating that a situation is about to become difficult or unmanageable.
examples: When the boss announced the new policy, it was kitty bar the door for the whole department.
With all those kids running around, it's kitty bar the door if we don't get them organized.
The moment the news broke, it was kitty bar the door for the stock market.
